sourceMeaningMnemonic: Behind a <radical>building</radical>, a <radical>cleat</radical>-wearing <radical>wolverine</radical> is holding his <radical>heart</radical> and trying to <kanji>hide</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You know the phrase, "You can run, but you can't hide?" This wolverine can't run anymore so he's trying to hide (even though he knows it probably won't work).
readingMnemonic: The wolverine looks up at the building he's trying to <kanji>hide</kanji> behind and sees it's an <reading>inn</reading> (<ja>いん</ja>).
readingInfo: Lucky wolverine! Inns are good for hiding. The staff isn't supposed to give out his room number, and there are tons of different rooms for him to hide in.
